User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block access to source maps and config files
Disallow: *.map$
Disallow: *.json$
Disallow: /assets/syllabus/

# Allow important assets
Allow: /assets/images/
Allow: *.css$
Allow: *.js$

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://zenetratechnologies.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional, helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1
